column4: I'm trying to set up a single LVM drive on my SD card. I have partitioned /dev/mmcblk0 to have Linux LVM (8e) partition, which is at /dev/mmcblk0p1. However, pvcreate /dev/mmcblk0p1 fails with "Device not found (or ignored by filtering)." My /etc/lvm/lvm.conf is set to scan from /dev, and should include all devices. What's going wrong here? Why can't I initialize /dev/mmcblk0p1 as a LVM physical volume?
